alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Washington; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 25 at 2:53PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An Area of Moderate to Heavy Snow Will Affect Downeast Maine... At 2:50 PM, a band of moderate to heavy snow was located from southern Penobscot County to northern Washington County, or from Bangor to Topsfield, moving slowly southward. Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are expected with this band, along with visibility of one quarter mile or less at times. This heavy snowfall will produce hazardous conditions with limited visibility and travel difficulties. Use caution if driving and always turn your headlights on when visibility is reduced so other vehicles can see you. Snow will begin to taper off later this afternoon and end this evening.
